dormitory.title: Dormitory
dormitory.description: Double or triple occupancy in our Elm or Kaufmann buildings. Shared bathrooms with a mix of twin and bunk beds.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Double occupancy in Maple, Blue Heron, or Cedar. Rooms have queen and twin beds with bathrooms shared between two rooms.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Double occupancy in our Scheuer and Pine buildings. Rooms have private bathrooms, with a mix of queen and twin beds.

plus.title: Standard Plus
plus.description: Double occupancy in our Weinberg and May buildings. Rooms have private bathrooms, with a mix of queen and twin beds.

camper.title: Camper
camper.description: Bring your own tent, sleeping bag, and towel. Includes all meals, programming, and access to bathrooms and hot showers.

commuter.title: Commuter
commuter.description: Includes all meals and programming. Does not include any overnight lodging.
